name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Macro Commander Web Plugin for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate web pages and applications using Macro Commander.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to automate web pages and web applications open in Chrome web browser using Macro Commander.
